## SmEvent.addListener() method

Register a new listener for this event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addListener(callback: Function): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | Function | Function called each time the event is triggered. |

**Returns:**

void
